front.div:
BioVigilant has invented an optical technology that can determine the quantity and size of very
small particles in liquid or air, and simultaneously determine whether each particle is inert or
biologic, all in real time. The result is that BioVigilant's instruments provide instantaneous and
continuous microbial detection, thereby creating wide-ranging and profound positive
consequences for pharmaceutical manufacturers.
This paper briefly discusses the problems BioVigilant's technology solves, how its technology
works, and how it is applied.
